text: "Twilight" is a 1981 song by British band Electric Light Orchestra and is the second single from their ninth studio album Time. It went to number 30 in the United Kingdom, number 38 in the United States, number 18 in Ireland and the Netherlands, number 17 in Germany, number 10 in France and number 15 in Austria. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Electronic rock songs Category:Space rock songs Category:Electric Light Orchestra songs
title: Twilight (Electric Light Orchestra song)
